original_text: These are the children of the province, that went up out of the captivity, of those that had been carried away, whom Nebuchadnezzar the king of Babylon had carried away, and came again to Jerusalem and to Judah, every one unto his city;
korean_text: 옛적에 바벨론 왕 느부갓네살에게 사로잡혀 갔던 자들 중에서 놓임을 받고 예루살렘과 유다에 돌아와 각기 자기들의 성읍에 이른 자들 곧

sentences.original_text: These are the children of the province
that went up out of the captivity
of those that had been carried away
whom Nebuchadnezzar the king of Babylon had carried away
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론 왕 느부갓네살이 사로잡아 간 자들을

sentences.original_text: and came again to Jerusalem and to Judah
